official_playing: Game "{{game}}": Team "{{team}}" cannot officiate a game they are playing in
orphaned_team: Team "{{team}}" is not connected to any game
game_outside_container: Game "{{game}}" must be inside a stage container
game_invalid_parent: Game "{{game}}" parent is not a valid stage
team_outside_container: Team "{{team}}" must be inside a stage container
team_invalid_parent: Team "{{team}}" parent is not a valid stage
stage_outside_field: Stage "{{stage}}" is not inside a field container
stage_invalid_parent: Stage "{{stage}}" parent is not a valid field
team_overlap: Team "{{team}}" is scheduled in overlapping games: "{{game1}}" and "{{game2}}"
progression_incomplete: Game "{{game}}" is missing a progression source for its {{slot}} team
stage_time_conflict: Stage "{{stage2}}" starts before preceding stage "{{stage1}}" ends on field "{{field}}"
stage_sequence_time: Stage "{{stage2}}" starts at {{time2}}, which is before preceding stage "{{stage1}}" starts ({{time1}})
stage_sequence_type: Stage "{{stage2}}" ({{type2}}) follows "{{stage1}}" ({{type1}}), which might be out of order
progression_order: Progression from stage "{{sourceStage}}" to earlier stage "{{targetStage}}"
uneven_game_distribution: Group "{{group}}" has uneven game distribution (min: {{minGames}}, max: {{maxGames}})
